TEXT.TITLE: FLUOR CORP <FLR> WINS 197.6 MLN DLR ARMY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Fluor Corp said it won a 197.6 mln dlr contract from the U.S. Army Engineer District, with a follow-on option for an additional 450 mln dlrs. Fluor's Fluor Constructors Inc unit will perform procurement and construction for Ground Based Free Electron Laser-Technology Integrated Experiment Project at the White Sands Missile Range in New Mexico. Phase I Construction will begin this month and is scheduled for completion in September, 1990. Based on its results, a Phase II follow-on option may be implemented for an additional two years, the company said. Reuter
